name: DisplacementFilterOptions
description: Configuration options for the DisplacementFilter. A displacement filter uses a sprite's texture as a displacement map, moving pixels of the target based on the color values of corresponding pixels in the displacement sprite. ```ts const options: DisplacementFilterOptions = { sprite: displacementSprite, scale: { x: 20, y: 20 } }; const filter = new DisplacementFilter(options); ```

properties.name: sprite
properties.description: The sprite whose texture will be used as the displacement map. Red channel = horizontal displacement Green channel = vertical displacement ```ts const displacementSprite = new Sprite(texture); const filter = new DisplacementFilter({ sprite: displacementSprite }); ```

properties.name: scale
properties.description: The scale of the displacement effect. Can be a single number for uniform scaling or a point-like object for separate x/y scaling. ```ts // Uniform scaling new DisplacementFilter({ sprite, scale: 20 }); // Separate scaling new DisplacementFilter({ sprite, scale: { x: 10, y: 15 } }); ```
